Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier medical emergency at UIC-Halsted. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running with residual delays following an earlier medical emergency at UIC-Halsted.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
